about_the_game:
ThinkExplosive is a small first-person puzzle-platformer about bombs! Throw bombs to overcome obstacles - or launch yourself to new heights. Explore the corridors of an abandoned facility and discover new game mechanics.

GAMEPLAY

Welcome to ThinkExplosive! In this first-person puzzle-platformer, you'll discover the skill of bomb-throwing as your primary tool to move through a series of different puzzles and parkour sections. Bomb your way through obstacles...

...or send yourself soaring into the air with a well-placed explosion!

It's all about mastering the art of "controlled chaos".

EXTREME MODE

The main campaign was too easy for you? If you're looking for a real challenge, there’s Extreme Mode, which you unlock after completing the main campaign. I am sure - this mode will push your skills to the limit!

STORY

Welcome to a world gone mad... The failed experiement has turned everything into a wasteland. But fear not, you've got Ethan to guide you through this post-apocalyptic puzzle game. As the player, you find yourself trapped in a abandoned facility filled with puzzles and parkour challenges. Your goal? Get out...! The facility is waiting for you... or what's left of it, that is.

At the end of the day, this game is about having fun. So get ready to blow things up, defy gravity, and take on the bombastic experience in ThinkExplosive! It's a blast, quite literally! :)

FEATURES

  • 10 Main Levels: Navigate through 10 unique levels, each presenting its own set of puzzles and obstacles.

  • 10 Extreme Mode Levels: Unlock the Extreme Mode and take on the 10 levels in a new way, designed to push your skills to the limit.

  • 7 Hidden Golden Bombs: They are collectables - Find them all!

  • 2 Different Bomb Types: Unlock two bomb types, each with its own properties and strategic advantages

  • Game Timer: Compete against other players with an integrated timer and online leaderboards

  • Physics-Based Gameplay: Dynamic physics, adding more fun to your bomb-throwing maneuvers

  • Looore: Engage with the character Ethan, who talks to you through a walkie-talkie

  • Steam Workshop: Play levels created by other players

  • Built-in Level Editor: Build your own levels and publish them to the Steam Workshop

LEVEL EDITOR

Build your own levels and publish them to the Steam Workshop!
